thread.title: Reservation Error
thread.title_full: Reservation Error - Review of NYLO New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: robertbC2583LN
title: Reservation Error
text: Staff communication skills and ability to quickly and effectively resolve major issues were poor. I've never experienced a situation like this where I was made to feel responsible for communicating the issue to SEVERAL staff members who continued to send me to other staff members- I didn't have the time or energy- ESPECIALLY to resolve an issue caused by staff negligence
